interaction.title: Composing maps
interaction.content: Choose tools, viewer options, layers groups, priorities and interactions.

interaction.title: Inspect values in realtime
interaction.content: View each region value stock and cell values in real time.

interaction.title: Simulate sceneries
interaction.content: Run simulations with chosen maps together with user input values.

interaction.title: Filter map to interest ranges
interaction.content: Allows to dinamically limit range of values in each sceneries.

interaction.title: Show transitions
interaction.content: Select a value or a transition between two sceneries and only show what changed between them.

database.title: CSR DATABASE
database.content: All CSR Maps are available to your project, all maps are categorized with the most recent metadata and content.

database.title: DISPLAY YOUR MAPS
database.content: Easily configure a server to display your maps on CSRMaps or in a GIS software.

database.title: DATA SOURCES
database.content: Use others data sources in your project: CSV, JSON or cloud storage services.

license.title: EDUCATIONAL
license.content: Completely free to use for any educational purpose.

license.title: PROFITABLE
license.content: Free to use in any profitable project except the highcharts library. This library has a limitation in highchart license contact directly them.

license.title: RESEARCH
license.content: Feel free to display any research project results even using the CSRMaps Database.

license.title: DOCUMENTATION
license.content: View complete documentation with use cases.
